column4: how do change the buttons colour like back and forward and stuf
well, there are themes just for firefox for it's toolbar buttons like back and forwards.  Most other buttons in GTK apps, most of Gnome, you can skin the buttons and menus and stuff with GTK themes.

the firefox themes you can install from the gnome website, and you can get GTK themes from gnome-look.org and there are already a few different themes installed if you look in System -> Preferences -> Theme
